Author: pas-de-dog
Text: My partner was in and out of res, these were the things they frequently requested their mom and I bring as well as stuff I wanted while IP:  * Sweatshirts and sweatpants/leggings/yoga pants * Batteries (for remotes, game controllers, etc.) * Markers/felt-tip pens/coloured pencils * Sketchbook/colouring book/word search * A soft blanket * Stuffed animal
